channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nagasaki mayor warns of nuclear war 80 years after atom bomb attack
item.description: Shiro Suzuki calls for a halt to armed conflicts on the anniversary of the atom bomb attack.

item.title: 8/4: CBS Evening News Plus
item.description: Inside the Trump administration's push for more ICE centers like "Alligator Alcatraz"; Political analyst on Texas' redistricting fight

item.title: Rapidly growing fire prompts thousands of evacuations in California
item.description: The Canyon Fire, which began on Thursday afternoon, has blazed through nearly 5,000 acres in less than 24 hours.

item.title: Military veteran arrested week after fatal Montana shooting
item.description: Authorities have not given a motive in the attack but said he was a regular at the pub.

item.title: Trump and Putin to meet in Alaska for Ukraine talks next week
item.description: The announcement comes hours after the US leader signals Ukraine may have to cede territory to end the war.

item.title: Officer killed, gunman dead in shooting at CDC and Emory campus in Atlanta
item.description: Police in Atlanta say the suspect is dead and there is no ongoing threat after reports of an active shooter near Emory University and the CDC headquar...

item.title: Judge bars Beto O'Rourke's PAC from funding Texas Democrats in redistricting standoff
item.description: Texas AG Ken Paxton accused Beto O'Rourke's Powered by People of deceptive fundraising. O'Rourke vowed to keep fighting and plans a Fort Worth rally.

item.title: 8/8: CBS Evening News
item.description: Trump, Putin to hold meeting in Alaska next week; Bed Bath & Beyond returns with new store in Nashville

item.title: Azerbaijan and Armenia sign peace deal at White House summit with Trump
item.description: "It's been a long time coming," Trump said of the agreement, which will reopen key transport routes.

item.title: Former astronaut and Apollo 13 commander Jim Lovell has died
item.description: The giant, multi-billion dollar space telescope that NASA is about to launch is sometimes billed as Hubble's successor. Will this new telescope, which...

item.title: Trump says he will host Putin in Alaska next Friday to talk about Ukraine
item.description: President Trump has been pushing to broker an end to the war in Ukraine since he took office. But it hasn't been quick or easy.

Suspected gunman and police officer dead in shooting near the CDC and Emory University, police say
item.description: Police say a suspected shooter and a police officer are dead after law enforcement responded to an active shooter near the U.S.

item.title: Louisiana to pay $9 million to a man who was shot in the back by state trooper during traffic stop
